def OnCMD_GERARORDEMCOMPRAExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_CONTRATOS")) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLECONTRATO", item.Handle)
